About Me

Bio

Computer science & Management student, Full-stack developer with emphasis on Front-end (HTML, CSS, JS, and React.js). my love for technology came from my mother who was a programmer and software manager. Always looking for real-world problems that can be solved using software development… for example, I was part of the development team of Israel corona map, an open-source project which Showed the location of the last infected. Nowadays, on my second-year studies, I’m Looking for my next challenge as a software engineer.
